channel.title: Harpoon into weaponspot (How to do it?)
channel.description:
How to make a harpoon into a weapon?' I wanna make it as a admin weapon with high str bonus, but I can't wear it :P hope someone can help!
using PimpScape source!

item.title: Harpoon into weaponspot (How to do it?)
item.dc:creator: @timmers4 timmers4
item.description:
@timmers4 wrote:

idc, I don’t want players to know what it is
so how can I make it so that i can wear it?

item.title: Harpoon into weaponspot (How to do it?)
item.dc:creator: @timmers4 timmers4
item.description:
@timmers4 wrote:

//Few item types for equipping public static int capes[] = {}; public static int boots[] = {}; public static int gloves[] = {}; public static int shields[] = {}; public static int hats[] = {}; public static int amulets[] = {}; public static int arrows[] = {}; public static int rings[] = {}; public static int body[] = {}; public static int legs[] = {}; public static int platebody[] = {}; public static int fullHelm[] = {}; public static int fullMask[] = {}; //All other IDs are weapons (I hope)

Where to add it?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 17, 2009, 12:12:25 pm[/size][hr]also in wich folder I have to look to see like all server commands?
